message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with cross-modal retrieval, which involves multiple modalities of data such as images, text, and audio. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is a likely category as it deals with image and video processing. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also a likely category as the paper focuses on similarity retrieval across heterogeneous modalities. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another likely category as the paper proposes a novel learning method for cross-modal hashing. cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a possible category as the paper deals with multiple modalities of data. Finally, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is a possible category as the paper proposes a new method for representation learning and similarity retrieval.
